issues.guideline: 横スクロール禁止（カルーセル除く）
タップターゲット最小44px角

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.24 (foreground color: #92400e, background color: #fbbf24, font size: 9.2pt (12.25px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
